title: Topic 002 Question 031
body: Your company has an Azure subscription that uses Microsoft Defender for Cloud.
The company signs a contract with the United States government.
You need to review the current subscription for NIST 800-53 compliance.
options: From Defender for Cloud, review the Azure security baseline for audit report.
From Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps, create an access policy for cloud applications.
From Defender for Cloud, enable Defender for Cloud plans.
From Azure Policy, assign a built-in initiative that has a scope of the subscription.
